original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
This role offers a unique opportunity to blend your business acumen with technical proficiency, serving as a critical link between business needs and effective system configurations. As a key player in our organization, you will ensure our systems accurately reflect evolving business requirements and operate at peak efficiency. Your primary focus will be on developing innovative processes and leveraging cutting-edge technologies, such as machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI), to deliver tailored solutions within the vehicle configuration space.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to thoroughly understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows).
- Translate complex business requirements into robust technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement, leveraging database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools to uncover valuable insights.
- Proactively identify opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through innovative configuration changes and the adoption of industry best practices.
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the quality of your work.
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements.
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure seamless implementation and continuous support of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to think critically and devise creative solutions to complex challenges.
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to effectively translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.
- Proficiency in understanding and manipulating data, including the ability to query databases, generate reports, and visualize data using appropriate tools.
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and a proven track record of working in fast-paced, iterative environments.

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java programming language and SQL.
- Expertise in the application of machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques to solve business problems.
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration processes and systems, allowing you to hit the ground running and deliver immediate value.

Required Experience:
- Demonstrated experience in the successful implementation and deployment of machine learning and AI-powered solutions.
- A strong background in business process analysis and the ability to translate business requirements into technical configurations.

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in Agile development environments and collaborating with cross-functional teams.
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration systems and industry best practices.

Required Tools:
- Proficiency in using a variety of data analysis and visualization tools, such as SQL, Python, and Tableau.
- Expertise in working with configuration management and version control systems, such as Git.
- Familiarity with project management and collaboration tools, like Jira and Confluence.

As a Technical Configuration Specialist, you will play a pivotal role in bridging the gap between our organization's business objectives and the technical solutions that power our vehicle configuration processes. With your unique blend of business acumen and technical proficiency, you will be responsible for translating complex requirements into efficient and scalable system configurations, ensuring our systems accurately reflect evolving business needs and operate at optimal performance.

Key Responsibilities:
- Engage with stakeholders across various departments to thoroughly understand their business requirements, gather comprehensive details, and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows).
- Leverage your technical expertise to configure and maintain our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and updating configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and swiftly resolving any configuration-related issues.
- Analyze existing data to uncover trends, identify inefficiencies, and pinpoint opportunities for improvement, utilizing database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools to provide valuable insights.
- Proactively identify ways to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through innovative configuration changes and the adoption of industry best practices.
- Rigorously test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, actively participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate the quality and performance of your work.
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and facilitate future enhancements.
- Collaborate closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure seamless implementation and continuous support of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to think critically and devise creative, data-driven solutions to complex challenges.
- Outstanding communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to effectively translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.
- Proficiency in data manipulation and analysis, including the ability to query databases, generate reports, and visualize data using appropriate tools.
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and a proven track record of thriving in fast-paced, iterative environments.

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java programming and SQL, allowing you to dive deep into the technical aspects of our systems.
- Expertise in the application of machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques to solve complex business problems.
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration processes and systems, enabling you to hit the ground running and deliver immediate value.

Required Experience:
- Demonstrated success in the implementation and deployment of machine learning and AI-powered solutions.
- A strong background in business process analysis and the ability to translate business requirements into effective technical configurations.

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in Agile development environments and collaborating with cross-functional teams.
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration systems and industry best practices.

Required Tools:
- Proficiency in using a variety of data analysis and visualization tools, such as SQL, Python, and Tableau.
- Expertise in working with configuration management and version control systems, like Git.
- Familiarity with project management and collaboration tools, including Jira and Confluence.

As a Technical Configuration Specialist, you will play a pivotal role in aligning our organization's business objectives with the powerful technical solutions that drive our vehicle configuration processes. With your unique blend of business acumen and technical expertise, you will be responsible for translating complex requirements into efficient and scalable system configurations, ensuring our systems accurately reflect evolving business needs and operate at the highest levels of performance.
